autofish.msg: This mod is a client side cheat incompatible with the modpack. The Stardew fishing miningame can be disabled using the /stardew_fishing command in-game.

essential.msg:
Essential has been known to cause many issues that're difficult for developers to solve, as well as irreversible world corruption. We recommend the following as alternatives for free multiplayer:
  • Cloudflared
  • Tunnely
  • e4mc
